argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcd0v2.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lcd0v2.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcd0v2.d | |- D = ( LDual ` U ) |
| 4 |  | lcd0v2.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) |
| 5 |  | lcd0v2.c | |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 6 |  | lcd0v2.o | |- O = ( 0g ` C ) |
| 7 |  | lcd0v2.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` U ) = ( Base ` U ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` U ) = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) = ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 8, 9, 10, 5, 6, 7 | #P_lcd0v | |- ( ph -> O = ( ( Base ` U ) X. { ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) } ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 7 | #P_dvhlmod | |- ( ph -> U e. LMod ) |
| 13 | 8, 9, 10, 3, 4, 12 | #P_ldual0v | |- ( ph -> .0. = ( ( Base ` U ) X. { ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` U ) ) } ) ) |
| 14 | 11, 13 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> O = .0. ) |
